WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling by Application Before Navigation
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: DATA lo_cmp_usage TYPE REF TO if_wd_component_usage.
DATA: lo_nd_n_s_siparis TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node,
INNER JOIN ekko AS b ON b~ebeln = a~ebeln
LEFT JOIN makt AS e ON e~matnr = a~matnr " MATNR açıklaması için MAKT tablosu kullanıldı.
INNER JOIN lfa1 AS c ON c~lifnr = b~lifnr " LIFNR açıklaması için LFA1 tablosu kullanıldı.
INNER JOIN t024 AS d ON d~ekgrp = b~ekgrp " EKGRP açıklaması için T024 tablosu kullanıldı.
DATA lo_nd_n_s_siparis TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA: lo_node TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node,
DATA lo_nd_n_showbtn TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA lo_el_n_showbtn TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_element.
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
